mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEMID, I.PRODUCTID, I.CATID AS "product.categoryId", LISTPRICE, UNITCOST, SELLER AS supplierId, I.PRODUCTID AS "product.productId", NAME AS "product.name", DESCR AS "product.description", STATUS, ATTR1 AS attribute1, ATTR2 AS attribute2, ATTR3 AS attribute3, ATTR4 AS attribute4, ATTR5 AS attribute5, ISAUCTION, IMAGE, ITEMTITLE FROM ITEM I, PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID AND I.PRODUCTID = #{value}

SELECT I.ITEMID, I.PRODUCTID, LISTPRICE, UNITCOST, SELLER, I.PRODUCTID AS "product.productId", NAME AS "product.name", DESCR AS "product.description", I.CATID AS "product.categoryId", STATUS, ATTR1 AS attribute1, ATTR2 AS attribute2, ATTR3 AS attribute3, ATTR4 AS attribute4, ATTR5 AS attribute5, QTY AS quantity, ISAUCTION, ITEMTITLE FROM ITEM I, INVENTORY V, PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID AND I.ITEMID = V.ITEMID AND I.ITEMID = #{value}
SELECT ITEMID, UNITCOST, STATUS, ISAD AS ADSTATUS, ISAUCTION FROM ITEM WHERE SELLER = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ISAUCTION FROM ITEM WHERE ITEMID= #{itemId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET STATUS=#{status} WHERE ITEMID=#{itemId}
